mapper.sql: id, roleid, account, name, password, flag, createtime, lastlogintime
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, roleid, account, name, password, flag, createtime, lastlogintime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=DATE})

mapper.update:
update user
roleid = #{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE},
lastlogintime = #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=DATE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set roleid = #{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, lastlogintime = #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from user where account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
